Package de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds

Class HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
      • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICalculator, IHarmonicBondForceCalculator, IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
    public class HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator
extends HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
implements IHarmonicBondForceCalculator
    Harmonic bond conservative force calculator The following particle arrays are changed during accumulation process ("+-=" operations): ParticleArrays.getF_x ParticleArrays.getF_y ParticleArrays.getF_z NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation avoids collisions of access of particle indices thus a lock is NOT necessary.
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

      Bond force calculation NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation guarantees for aDoubleAdder being unique in current working thread thus NO thread-safe implementation of double adder is necessary.

      • calculateBondProperty

        protected void calculateBondProperty​(int aParticleIndex_i,
                                     int aParticleIndex_j,
                                     double aRij_x,

                                     double aRij_z,
                                     double aBondLength,
                                     double aForceConstant,
                                     HarmonicBond.HarmonicBondBehaviour aHarmonicBondBehaviour,
                                     AdderGroup anAdderGroup,
                                     Parameters aParameters)
        Bond force calculation NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation guarantees for aDoubleAdder being unique in current working thread thus NO thread-safe implementation of double adder is necessary.
        Specified by:
        calculateBondProperty in class HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
        Parameters:
        aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
        aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
        aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
        aBondLength - Bond length
        aForceConstant - Force constant
        aHarmonicBondBehaviour - Behaviour of harmonic bond
        anAdderGroup - Adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe)
        aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
